## Description
Discount all your currently enabled channel rewards by a specified percentage and set them back to their original cost whenever you want.

![Picture](assets/media/reward_discount_title_2.png)

---

## Import Code
```scss

```

---


## Installation

1. Copy the import code from above and import the content

    ![Import Actions](assets/media/import_actions.png)

2. Done! ðŸ¥³

---

## Settings

The `[Channel Reward Discount] Apply Discount` action allows for some custom settings.

![Picture](assets/media/reward_discount_settings.png)

1. You can change the discount percentage by editing the **Set Argument** `discountPercentage` subaction. So a value of `50` will discount the rewards by 50%.

2. **Set Argument** `excludedRewards` will allow you to exclude specific rewards from the discount. Just type their title in there, seperate multiple rewards by a comma.

3. Both actions also have a Twitch Message response that you can either change to your liking or straight up disable if you don't want any response in chat.

{: .new }
> - You can stack discounts!
>
> - Rewards can only be discounted if they're owned by Streamer.bot. You can check if they're owned in your `Platforms -> Twitch -> Channel Point Rewards` tab.
